messages.content: You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
What is the first step i need to do when i run the app?
You need to open page '/'. After that log in with credentials
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How do i log in in the app
When you open the app and see login page. You need to insert username and password in the form on login page and press log in button
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How do i know i see login page?
You can check page layout with css selector '.layout__login' is visible.
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How do i find specific form input on login page?
You need to use css selector 'input[name={field_name}]' where field_name is data you need to provide
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How do i insert data in form input?
Find form input with related css selector and provide its value from user's input
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How to submit login form?
Click on login button with css selector '#login_btn'
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How to do i know that login was succesful?
I should see succesful network response related to login page
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How to do i see network requests and responses?
I should use cypress framework api to subscribe and watch for responses that trigger requests related to the page
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
What network requests and responses are related to login page?
Request type POST request with url containing 'oauth2/token' in path string
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
What is the next page i should see after login page?
You will see 'Global Search' page.
You are a automate engineer who creates end to end tests with cypress framework API.
How do i know this is the 'Global Search' page?
Check that element with css selector '.layout__Search' is visible and element with selector '.header-title' inside of that page contains 'Global Search' text
